amendment.description: Amendment redirects $44 million in funding within the General Operating Expenses account of the Veterans Benefits Administration for increased staffing in certain regional Veterans Affairs offices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that $44 million be designated to increase staff at the Veterans Affairs regional offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 172 (Roll no. 189).
